title: League of Legends Setup/Installer Not Working
body:
Hey everybody, just got my old computer back up and running, had to do a full factory reset and just fixed my GPU drivers, but doesn't seem like the League of Legends setup isn't working (can't install the launcher)

Every time I run the installer, I get to the part where it says "Installing League of Legends," it gets stuck on "Installing prerequisite software" then it says "Are you sure you want to cancel League of Legends installation?" I'll click no, and it'll repeat the whole issue and keep asking me if I want to cancel the setup.

Is it because I'm on Vista Service Pack 1? I just installed Direct X9.0 as well, I'm not sure what the problem is.

Is there a different installer I can use?

replies.body: Bump, someone please help. Really want to install the game

This very well may be caused by being on Service Pack 1. We only support Vista Service Pack 2, so I recommend [installing it](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/13858/windows-vista-service-pack-2-install) and updating Windows entirely.

Let me know if this issue persists.

Okay, so I installed SP2. Completely did all the automatic updates for Windows, and still I get the same problem.

I run the league installer as administrator, and it gets stuck on "Installing prerequisite software" then it says "Are you sure you want to cancel League of Legends installation?" I'll click no, and it'll repeat the whole issue and keep asking me if I want to cancel the setup.


EDIT:

Fixed it, but the installer was still broken. Had to go to an old post in 2013 and download the original league installer and patch it up to the latest one.
I have this same exact problem. If you could link the old download that'd be great! maybe it will work for me too

> [{quoted}](name=Mr Hígh Road,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=UUPkrIUN,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-10-09T00:06:57.731+0000)
>
> I have this same exact problem. If you could link the old download that'd be great! maybe it will work for me too

Hey, sorry for the late reply! I hope you have figured it out by now, but here's the link I used. It worked perfectly.
http://l3cdn.riotgames.com/Installer/SingleFileInstall/LeagueOfLegendsBaseNA.exe

Have fun! This should work for ya.
Wow this actually worked you are my hero!
Thank you. May God (if you believe in one) bless your soul, for this follow up post.
the link isn't working anymore is there another way?

Do you know how to patch an installer to the new one?
Edit. Nvm Thanks for help!
